lens: Lens with optical image stabilizer, 12x zoom,
powersupply: DC8 V-9 V (Supplied from the AG-HMR10)
digitalzoom: 2x/5x/10x (When set to 59.94 Hz: 1080/60i, 720/60p only; when set to 50 Hz: 1080/50i, 720/50p only)
